item.title: Beginners guide to Kubernetes namespaces
item.description: Namespaces are Kubernetes Objects used to divide a Cluster into smaller organized sub clusters as per different needs. Namespaces enables users to isolate group of resources within a cluster, this is useful when multiple teams are working on a shared cluster and each team is independent of others. In this article, we will discuss how to change or switch namespaces in a Kubernetes cluster, but before that let’s start with the basics.
